I am a researcher and economist specializing in international trade and climate change. I am affiliated with the ==Austrian Institute of Economic Research== and the ==Kiel Institute for the World Economy==. I hold a Ph.D. in Quantitative Economics from ==Christian-Albrechts-Universität zu Kiel==. I studied Agricultural Economics (M.Sc.) and Agricultural Science (B.Sc.) at ==Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin==. Recently, I visited the ==University of California, Berkeley==. From 2022 to 2024, I am a Fellow of the ==Joachem-Herz Foundation==.
